resources.name: server/:type/flavors
mcserver-resource-api
resources.description: Easily query and download nearly any resource such as plugins, server runtimes, etc.

resources.name: server/:type/:flavor/manifest
server/:type/:flavor/download/:version/:build
resources.description:
Download a raw jarfile

### Request parameters
* **`:type`**
  The type of server. Possible values: `standalone` | `proxy`.
* **`:flavor`**
  The flaver/variation of software. Possible values can be found by fetching the   request above.
* **`:version`**
  The version of the flavor. Possible values can be found by fetching the manifest for that flavor.
* **`:build`**
  The build number of the flavor. Possible values can be found by fetching the manifest for that flavor. **However, you will most likley want to use `latest` for this parameter.**
  
### Response type
**Response is binary.**

Content-Type: `application/java-archive` (`.jar`)
